item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: JokeTag
item.description:
dessertmonkeyjk:

trip over chair explodes upon contact with floor

I don’t know about you but I was laughing for about 2 minutes after reading that. That reminds me of Sgt. Johnson in Halo 1 getting blown away as the Elites blow the escape pod door open actually.

My exact response

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
Leijonasisu:

That would be me I use the same name for my YT channel lol glad to see so many people appreciate it. Though I see you’ve edited it a little yourself nice job!

Rest of the .gifs are here. There are in multiple file sizes and quality etc.
bit.ly/QAroRp

The gif I posted is exactly as how I received it when I made the request for it (on an imageboard, of all places, lol…). All I gave them was the link to the video and specific time. They took it upon themselves to edit it in the way they did. The one I posted seems way too slow to me. Whereas, your gifs look much better running at proper speed

item.source: barney Explodes when walking over a chair

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: outlive
item.description:
the problem is the physics engine of source - havok
as you probably noticed - we have implemented a gibbing system into our game.

force > gibbing force = gib

barneys forward motion was driving him into the collision box of the small table.
the physics engine then tries to compensate by pushing barney out of the collision box.
this creates a huge force on barney - enough to gib him.

Read full topic

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
I’ve yet to see it happen personally while playing BMS, but I’ve had it happen to myself at least once. And of course many, many, many times playing all sorts of other source-games. It’s not unique to BMS and I don’t really think it’s something “fixable” by the BMS team - well, besides removing all physics items from the game (which would be downright stupid).

Here, have a gif someone made for me upon someone else’s request.

Read full topic

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: slipkid
item.description:
Quietman:

Yes and I am saying that Barney exploding while walking over a chair is something that can happen in Source games because of the way the game engine works. I’ve seen it happen in Half Life 2 and various mods for it. You can get stuck on a prop and it will fling you out, sometimes with enough force to gib you. I’m not disagreeing with you slipkid I am just pointing out that it’s not something the BMS team have added.

Read full topic
item.source: barney Explodes when walking over a chair

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: Quietman
item.description:
slipkid:

That is not the issue, the issue is Barney exploding while walking over a chair, that is clearly not normal and is therefore a glitch that needs to be repaired.
:bms:

Yes and I am saying that Barney exploding while walking over a chair is something that can happen in Source games because of the way the game engine works. I’ve seen it happen in Half Life 2 and various mods for it. You can get stuck on a prop and it will fling you out, sometimes with enough force to gib you. I’m not disagreeing with you slipkid I am just pointing out that it’s not something the BMS team have added.

Read full topic

item.title: barney Explodes when walking over a chair
item.dc:creator: nallar
item.description:
slipkid:

Well the reason I have is because it is a glitch with the Mod and Barney at no time in the original Half-Life would explode when walking over a chair; so my point is that this needs to be fixed so on the contrary the is something that needs to be brought to the attention of the Devs so that they may at some point resolve the problem if they see fit; but thanks for your response but please to try to think before you post and consider waht is being said and why!

:retard:

Erm… what?!
